tender.description:
Leicester City Council Property division is soliciting for bids from reputable organisations to do electrical installations to new office at Armadale Youth Centre.

1) Supply + install the electrical installation to new office at Armadale Youth Centre.
2) Supply + install 8 x lenghts of 3mtr, 3 compartment dado trunking, complete
With all bends, boxes, accessories complete.
3) Supply + install 12 x mk twin sockets.
4) Wire sockets on circuit complete.
5) Supply + install 8 x twin 5ft T8 HF cat 2 surface fittings c/w lamps.
6) All works carried out to L.C.C specifications.
7) Issues certificate on completion.

For site visit meetings contact Bruce Boyall 0116 4541779 or 07977932803 - 8.30  4.15 Monday to Friday. For your bid to be considered you need to do site visit.

All Health & Safety requirements are to be met in relation to working in a public area.

1.3 Project Programme 

Return Date 
05/01/2015- 16:00hrs

Evaluation Period 
W/C 05/01/2015

Contract Start  
W/C 05/01/2015 



1.4 Contract Documents

The contract will be based on JCT RM2011 Repair and Maintenance Contract Commercial

Please complete the RFQ document and return it through the Due North System. 

Only quotations submitted through the Due North System will be accepted. 

This should be returned by 16.00hrs on 05/01/2015 at the very latest.
tender.title: Electrical installation to new office at Armadale Youth Centre (PAN0838)
tender.submissionMethodDetails: Please apply directly to the buyer using the contact details provided.
